app_description: iRecord: High quality Recorder with Accurate Voice Transcription iRecord is the perfect app for anyone looking to record high quality voice recordings and transcribe them with advanced AI technology. With iRecord you can: Record high quality audio from phone meetings and lectures with ease even in noisy environments or from a distance. Transcribe your recordings into text with high accuracy thanks to our advanced AI techniques that won the championship of the International Automatic Speech Recognition Challenge in 2021. Export your recordings and transcripts into multiple formats including Word and PDF for easy sharing and collaboration. Share your recordings and transcripts via messaging apps like WhatsApp and Messenger making it easy to collaborate with colleagues and friends. iRecord is packed with features that make it the perfect tool for recording and managing your voice recordings and transcripts. Some of our standout features include: Live transcription: Our app can transcribe audio in real time making it easy to take meeting notes or keep track of lectures. Automated transcription: You can set up iRecord to automatically transcribe your recordings as soon as they re finished saving you time and effort. Import Export: Import from any apps transcribe and export transcripts into different formats. Editing tools: Our app includes editing tools that automatically capitalize punctuate and break paragraphs as well as allow you to adjust and refine your transcripts after they ve been transcribed. Speaker identification: iRecord can identify and label different speakers in your recordings making it easy to follow along and understand who s speaking. Language support: iRecord can transcribe audio in a wide range of languages making it a great tool for multilingual users. Security and privacy are a top priority for us. Your data is confidential and we take great care to protect it. You have full control over your data and can delete it from your device at any time. Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a pro subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. Subscriptions and auto renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support. With a friendly price and more advanced features to come iRecord is the perfect tool for anyone looking to record and transcribe voice recordings with ease. Try it today and see for yourself!
